document.full_text: lush green fields hug a canal snaking through the dusty landscape of what was once afghanistan's breadbasket, feeding off water from a newly restored dam aimed at tarnishing the lure for farmers to cultivate poppy and help the taliban.
document.title: afghanistan, west hope farming will crush taliban, poppy lure
lines_and_colors: lush green fields hug a canal snaking through the dusty landscape of what was once afghanistan's breadbasket, feeding off water from a newly restored dam aimed at tarnishing the lure for farmers to cultivate poppy and help the taliban.
